items.name: Soup of the Day
items.description: Served with freshly baked sourdough bread.

items.name: Garlic Mushrooms
items.description: Sautéed button mushrooms in a creamy garlic sauce.

items.name: Buffalo Chicken Wings
items.description: Spicy wings served with blue cheese dip and celery sticks.

items.name: Grilled Ribeye Steak
items.description: 10oz Irish beef steak with peppercorn sauce, chips and salad.

items.name: Vegan Thai Green Curry
items.description: Seasonal vegetables in a fragrant coconut curry served with jasmine rice.

items.name: Traditional Fish & Chips
items.description: Beer-battered haddock, chunky chips, mushy peas, and tartar sauce.

items.description: Rich dark chocolate cake with vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Fruit Salad
items.description: A selection of seasonal fresh fruits.

items.name: Cheesecake of the Day
items.description: Ask your server for today’s selection.

notes: Please inform your server of any allergies or dietary restrictions.
